text: Geoffrey Edmund Brown (born 4 April 1924) is a former Australian tennis player. He was born in Murrurundi, New South Wales. He reached five Grand Slam finals during his career. He also played in the Australian Davis Cup in 1947 and 1948. Brown retired in 1958. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:Australian tennis players Category:Sportspeople from New South Wales
title: Geoff Brown (tennis)
